price: (34) Indeed, for the righteous with their Lord are the Gardens of Pleasure.
arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna lil'muttaqīna ʿinda rabbihim jannāti al-naʿīmi
